          KeepAliveScheduler keepAliveScheduler
          Keep-alive scheduler for managing session pings. Activated if keepAliveInterval is set. Disabled by default.

          String messageEndpoint
          The endpoint path for handling client messages

          McpServerSession.Factory sessionFactory
          Session factory for creating new sessions

          Map of active client sessions, keyed by session ID

          String sseEndpoint
          The endpoint path for handling SSE connections

          McpTransportContextExtractor<jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> contextExtractor

          boolean disallowDelete
          Flag indicating whether DELETE requests are disallowed on the endpoint.
        • isClosing
          boolean isClosing
          Flag indicating if the transport is shutting down.
        • keepAliveScheduler
          KeepAliveScheduler keepAliveScheduler
          Keep-alive scheduler for managing session pings. Activated if keepAliveInterval is set. Disabled by default.
        • mcpEndpoint
          String mcpEndpoint
          The endpoint URI where clients should send their JSON-RPC messages. Defaults to "/mcp".

          com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper

          McpStreamableServerSession.Factory sessionFactory

          Map of active client sessions, keyed by mcp-session-id.
